mapper.sql: id, name, key_id, key_secret, endpoint, bucket, create_time, expiration_time, state
mapper.select:
select
from tb_oss_config where state=0 order by create_time desc limit 0,1
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_oss_config
id,
name,
key_id,
key_secret,
endpoint,
bucket,
create_time,
expiration_time,
state,

mapper.update:
update tb_oss_config
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
key_id = #{keyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
key_secret = #{keySecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endpoint = #{endpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bucket = #{bucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_oss_config set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_id = #{keyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_secret = #{keySecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endpoint = #{endpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bucket = #{bucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
